translations: adj.[医] 指痉病的；[内科] 手足徐动症的

phrs.translation: 指痉病的, 手足徐动, 徐动型, 手足徐动型

sentences.sentence: Objective: to study the curative effect and methods of Acupotomy in athetoid cerebral palsy in this paper.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究针刀治疗痉挛型脑瘫的方法和疗效。

sentences.sentence: These seizures manifested not only focal convulsion of face or limb, but also choreoid or athetoid involuntary movements.
sentences.translation: 癜痫发作除表现为局限性颜面或个别肢体抽搐外，还可表现为舞蹈样或手足徐动样不自主运动发作。

sentences.sentence: The incidence of language delay in children with diplegia, tetraplegia and athetoid were 45.95%, 90% and 64.7%, respectively.
sentences.translation: 痉挛型四肢瘫和徐动型脑瘫患儿听理解与口语表达发育分离，理解明显好于表达，语言发育迟缓发生率分别为90 %和64.7%。
